column4: how do i get more than one program to play sounds using alsa?
something's configured wrongly to use OSS - set everything to use ALSA
if i have gaim up and then try to play a mp3 in xmms it will say failed to output to alsa, if i play xmms in oss i can hear the sound but then i can't hear the sound from gaim
now that i have all gnome sound configured to alsa now gaim or xmms will work
sound -> volume control -> file -> change device -> ALSA mixer & check settings
do you have a ~/.asoundrc ? if so, remove it, restart
sound -> volume control -> file -> change device -> OSS mixer & turn PCM2 right up
i got it fixed now by the help of some one from alsa
